alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL NASSAU...NORTHWESTERN DUVAL AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Kings Bay Base to Bryceville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, St. Marys, Fernandina Beach, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Kings Bay Base, Yulee, Cisco Gardens, Amelia City, and Bryceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Trout River; Western Duval
